comment:
* Utils for loading display related resources and calculations.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public static int getDisplayUniqueIdConfigIndex(Resources res, String displayUniqueId)
methods.comment:
* Gets the index of the given display unique id in {@link R.array#config_displayUniqueIdArray}
     * which is used to get the related cutout configs for that display.
     *
     * For multi-display device, {@link R.array#config_displayUniqueIdArray} should be set for each
     * display if there are different type of cutouts on each display.
     * For single display device, {@link R.array#config_displayUniqueIdArray} should not to be set
     * and the system will load the default configs for main built-in display.

methods.name: public static Display.Mode getMaximumResolutionDisplayMode(Display.Mode[] modes)
methods.comment: * Returns the Display.Mode with maximum resolution.

methods.name: public static float getPhysicalPixelDisplaySizeRatio(int physicalWidth, int physicalHeight, int currentWidth, int currentHeight)
methods.comment: * Get the display size ratio based on the physical display size.

methodNames: public static int getDisplayUniqueIdConfigIndex(Resources res, String displayUniqueId)
public static float getPhysicalPixelDisplaySizeRatio(int physicalWidth, int physicalHeight, int currentWidth, int currentHeight)
